root.name: Anna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis
root.description: OverviewAnna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis in a tennis game developed and published by Namco for the PlayStation platform. Anna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis never saw a release in the US.CameosSeveral Namco characters are unlockable characters in this game, including :Richard Miller from Time CrisisHeihachi from the Tekken seriesYoshimitsu from the Tekken seriesReiko Nagase from Ridge RacerPac-Man
